channel.title: Hirapius | Summoning | All skills working | Lottery | Stable Eco
channel.description:
[center][img]http://r76.cooltext.com/rendered/cooltext1900453390.png[/img] Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/egy1lnqf66h6mjs/Hirapius.jar?dl=0
Welcome to planeteco!
Our server offers many features and more to come each day!
Here's some of our basic features:
- Stable Economy - - Jad 100% working - - All specs/combat are fully working - - Lots to do! - - Friendly staff - - VPS hosted! (online 24/7) - - Professional coder experienced with 317's - - Torva, Pernix, all 600+ items - - Posted in multiple locations = more players! - - Events - - Vote rewards - - Summong 100% working - - All skills working except constructioning - - Loading 614 - - Tormented Demons (for dclaws) - Lottery - - Forum (not fully done although) - - Donator shops - - Custom teleport dialogues -
There's too many to list believe it or not!
Want more screenshots? Just let me know!
Forums: http://planeteco.forumotion.com
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/egy1lnqf66h6mjs/Hirapius.jar?dl=0
Join now!
Screenshots:

item.title: Hirapius | Summoning | All skills working | Lottery | Stable Eco
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

I’ll setup any forums up for you, no charge, contact me on skype: Waddafoock.
It hurts to see a decent server like that gets no players 'cause of their website.

Read full topic

item.title: Hirapius | Summoning | All skills working | Lottery | Stable Eco
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Interesting banner there you have going on there, not professional but it at least attract one’s attention. And the server itself looks kind of bland, looks like a lot of servers I’ve seen. Perhaps some more media that show the unique aspects of the server eh? And work on purchasing a host and domain for a forum, can use a free forum software like SMF.

Read full topic
